explains: n. 普遍性；广泛性；一般性；多方面性

sentences.en: Now researchers are applying scientific methods to the study of the universality of art.
sentences.cn: 现在，研究人员正在运用科学的方法来研究艺术的普遍性。

sentences.en: It is precisely in the particularity of contradiction that the universality of contradiction resides.
sentences.cn: 矛盾的普遍性即寓于矛盾的特殊性之中。

sentences.en: But the net is losing some of its openness and universality.
sentences.cn: 但是互联网的确正在丧失他的开放性以及通用性。
